name: Gothenberg Exhibition
obverse: Woman, facing left, holds out a wreath. She is leaning on a shield and is surrounded by various objects.
reverse: The exhibition building. Below the building and around the date are three small crowns.
reverse_inscriptions: * * TILL MINNE AF UTSTÄLLNINGARNE I GÖTEBORG * *
description: The exhibition was held in Gotheberg, Sweden in 1891.
